videos.description: Nick Fitzgerald loses his helmet on TD run, TD overturned. Samford takes over on their own 1.

videos.description: Devlin Hodges pass complete to Andrew Harris for 12 yds for a TD
videos.headline: D. Hodges pass,to A. Harris for 12 yds for a TD

videos.description: Mississippi State QB Nick Fitzgerald found Donald Gray for a 71-yard touchdown in the first quarter as well as a 74-yard score in the second quarter of the Bulldogs game against Samford.
videos.headline: Fitzgerald, Gray connect for two 70+ yards TDs in first half

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Fitzgerald, Gray connect for two 70+ yards TDs in first half) 2016/10/29 ESHEET
